item.title: 房地产股因利率前景和令人失望的盈利而下挫
item.description: 由于对美联储降息的预期减弱，以及令人失望的财报引发了对该行业前景的担忧，房地产经纪公司股票周四暴跌。【原文：Real estate brokerage stocks tumbled Thursday on waning expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, and as a disappointing earnings release raised concern about the sector’s outlook.】

item.title: 投资者团体呼吁日本公司实现零交叉持股
item.description: 一个代表贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）和富达国际（Fidelity International）等资产管理公司的投资者团体呼吁日本公司取消交叉持股，称这种长期存在的做法对公司的资本效率产生了 "有害影响"。【原文：An investor group representing asset managers including BlackRock Inc. and Fidelity International is calling on Japanese firms to abolish cross-shareholdings, saying the long-held practice has a “detrimental impact” on companies’ capital efficiency.】

item.title: 由 Vista 支持的 Solera 寻求超过 10 亿美元的 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 支持的汽车数据和软件服务提供商 Solera 正在考虑首次公开募股，可能会募集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Vista Equity Partners-backed automotive data and software services provider Solera is weighing an initial public offering that may raise over $1 billion, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 加密货币公司起诉美国证券交易委员会以抵制对以太坊的监管
item.description: 加密软件公司Consensys起诉美国证券交易委员会，试图抵制对以太坊区块链的监管，并反击该机构所谓的 "夺取加密货币未来控制权的运动"。【原文：Crypto software firm Consensys sued the US Securities and Exchange Commission in an effort to fend off regulation of the Ethereum blockchain and push back against what it called the agency’s “campaign to seize control over the future of cryptocurrency.”】

item.title: 为什么世界需要更多的铜— 更多的铜
item.description: 避免气候灾难通常被描述为一个政治意愿问题。然而，推动减少碳排放也是一项艰巨的技术和社会挑战。改造电力和交通系统，使其使用可再生能源，所需的铜将远远超过生产可再生能源的公司目前承诺提供的铜。【原文：Avoiding a climate catastrophe is often portrayed as a question of political will. Yet the push to reduce carbon emissions is also a daunting technical and societal challenge. Retooling power and transportation systems to run on renewable energy will require far more copper than the companies that produce it are currently committed to deliver.】

item.title: 一个经常被忽视的就业指标显示加拿大劳动力市场存在严重裂痕
item.description: 加拿大的就业市场不如该国最受关注的就业指标所显示的那么强劲。【原文：Canada’s job market is less robust than the country’s most closely watched employment indicator suggests.】

item.title: 格洛丽亚-范德比尔特的预科学校加入了慕尼黑市场的热潮
item.description: 女继承人格洛丽亚-范德比尔特（Gloria Vanderbilt）曾就读的惠勒学校（The Wheeler School）也加入了其他精英私立学校的行列，举债整修位于马萨诸塞州一个农场上的校园。【原文：The Wheeler School, where heiress Gloria Vanderbilt attended, is joining other elite private schools in taking on debt to spruce up its campus on a farm in Massachusetts.】

item.title: 克利夫斯首席执行官仍看好美国钢铁公司，但对新日铁交易仍存疑虑
item.description: 如果美国当局阻止新日本制铁公司以 141 亿美元收购美国标志性钢铁制造商，克利夫兰-克里夫斯公司仍希望收购美国钢铁公司或其部分资产。【原文：Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. still wants to buy United States Steel Corp. or some of its assets if US authorities block Nippon Steel Corp.’s $14.1 billion takeover of the iconic American steelmaker.】

item.title: 保尔森事务所签订西棕榈滩新大厦办公室租约
item.description: 相关公司（Related Cos.）在南佛罗里达州的一座摩天写字楼获得了新的金融租户，其中包括约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）的企业和一家私募股权公司，马克-贝索斯（Mark Bezos）是该公司的创始合伙人。【原文：A South Florida office skyscraper from Related Cos. landed new finance tenants, including a John Paulson business and a private equity firm that counts Mark Bezos as a founding partner.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团的跌跌撞撞使其成为矿业最大掠食者的猎物
item.description: 2022 年 4 月中旬，前老板马克-库蒂法尼（Mark Cutifani）离开英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）时，这家拥有百年历史的老牌矿商的境况好得出奇。随着全球摆脱封锁，金属价格飙升，公司最近公布了有史以来最好的年度利润，而这位广受欢迎的行业资深人士正将工作移交给一位值得信赖的副手。当天，盎格鲁集团的股价创下历史新高。【原文：When former boss Mark Cutifani left Anglo American Plc in mid-April 2022, things had rarely looked better for the century-old miner. Metals prices soared as the world emerged from lockdowns, the company had recently posted its best-ever annual profit and the popular industry veteran was handing over to a trusted lieutenant. Anglo stock hit a record the same day.】

item.title: 丘吉尔唐斯因盈利创纪录股价创一年来最大涨幅
item.description: 周四，丘吉尔唐斯公司（Churchill Downs Inc.【原文：Churchill Downs Inc. is charging ahead of the pack Thursday after posting record revenues and earnings that exceeded Wall Street’s expectations in the first quarter.】

AMC 电影院贷款人为陷入困境的连锁电影公司申请债务延期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Gibson Dunn & Crutcher 公司提供顾问服务的 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.【原文：A lender group to AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. advised by Gibson Dunn & Crutcher made a proposal to the movie theater company that would push back its near-term debt maturities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Interactive Brokers 客户可每天 22 小时交易国债
item.description: Interactive Brokers Group Inc. 的客户现在可以在一周内每天 22 小时交易美国国债，该电子经纪商正努力在全球范围内争取更多客户。【原文：Interactive Brokers Group Inc. customers can now trade US treasury bonds 22 hours a day during the week, as the electronic broker seeks to capture more clients globally.】

item.title: PG&E 首席执行官称 "巴菲特看错了加州火灾风险
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）警告说，野火已将美国西部的公用事业变成了高风险投资，这种说法是错误的；至少在加利福尼亚州，该州最大的电力供应商负责人是这样认为的。【原文：Warren Buffett’s warning that wildfires have turned utilities across the western US into risky investments is mistaken — at least in California, according to the head of the state’s largest electricity provider.】

item.title: 阿联酋创建化工巨头的交易因奥地利大选而推迟
item.description: 由于欧洲国家即将举行的大选使决策变得更加复杂，阿拉伯联合酋长国和奥地利的国有能源生产商计划达成的创建全球化工巨头的交易面临数月的额外延误。【原文：A planned deal by state-owned energy producers in the United Arab Emirates and Austria to create a global chemicals giant faces months of additional delays as upcoming elections in the European nation complicate decision-making.】

item.title: 巴西红利风波后巴西国家石油公司投资者胜出
item.description: 关于巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）分红问题的拉锯战持续了七个星期，最终该公司向投资者派发了 220 亿雷亚尔（约合 43 亿美元）的红利。【原文：A seven-week tug of war over Petrobras’s dividends wound up with the company delivering a 22-billion-reais ($4.3 billion) payout to investors.】

item.title: 价格坚挺影响美联储加息路径，美国债券市场遭抛售
item.description: 国债收益率升至 2024 年高点，因为有证据表明美国物价压力持续存在，这让人怀疑美联储是否有能力在今年晚些时候开始降息。【原文：Treasury yields rose to 2024 highs as evidence of sticky US price pressures casts doubt on the Federal Reserve’s ability to start lowering interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 世界银行称商品成本高企影响降息前景
item.description: 世界银行表示，全球大宗商品价格的下跌正在稳定在仍然虚高的水平上，这可能会使各国央行无法迅速降息。【原文：The decline in global commodity prices is stabilizing at levels that are still inflated, which could keep central banks from cutting interest rates quickly, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 汉莎航空计划提高欧盟报价以挽救 3.25 亿欧元的 ITA 交易
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）计划向意大利航空公司 ITA Airways 投资 3.25 亿欧元（3.48 亿美元），但此前的报价未能消除欧盟对竞争的担忧，预计德国汉莎航空公司将就该计划向欧盟监管机构提交新一轮让步。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG is expected to submit a fresh round of concessions to European Union regulators over its planned €325 million ($348 million) investment in Italian carrier ITA Airways after an earlier offer failed to allay European Union competition concerns.】

item.title: 6,300 亿美元的主动型 ETF 热潮由前 10 大公司主导
item.description: 晨星公司（Morningstar Inc.）正在向华尔街的基金经理们发出警告，希望他们抓住过去几年最热门的趋势之一：主动型交易所交易基金的迅猛发展。【原文：Morningstar Inc. is sounding a warning to Wall Street money managers looking to pounce on one of the hottest trends of the past few years: the breakneck rush into active exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 飞机零部件制造商 Loar 公司 3.08 亿美元首次公开募股后股价大涨 72
item.description: Loar Holdings Inc. 在首次公开募股中募集了 3.08 亿美元，发行价高于市场定价范围，该公司股价在首次交易中最高攀升了 72%。【原文：Loar Holdings Inc. shares climbed as much as 72% in its trading debut after the firm raised $308 million in an initial public offering that priced above a marketed range.】

item.title: 宽带用户流失日益严重，康卡斯特股价暴跌
item.description: 有线电视巨头康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：Comcast Corp. shares fell more than 7% Thursday after the cable-TV giant reported a steeper-than-expected loss of internet subscribers.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯称美国收益率飙升，坚持价值型股票，避开科技股
item.description: 周四，在一些令人担忧的美国经济数据公布后，国债和股市出现暴跌，比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）向投资者提出了一些建议："坚守价值型股票，暂时避开科技股"。【原文：Bill Gross offered some advice to investors as Treasuries and equities slumped Thursday after some worrisome US economic data: “Stick to value stocks, avoid tech for now.”】

item.title: Cathie Wood 的金融科技 ETF 去年回报 93% 后资产流失
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的散户大军整年都在 "擅离职守"--甚至在她表现最好的交易所交易基金中也是如此。【原文：Cathie Wood’s retail army has gone AWOL all year – even in her best-performing exchange-traded fund.】

item.title: 顶级可可种植商寻求避免价格上涨后出现出口违约
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，象牙海岸正努力避免可可出口违约潮，计划补偿托运人因支付给农民的价格意外上涨而造成的损失。【原文：Ivory Coast is seeking to avoid a wave of cocoa-export defaults with a plan to compensate shippers for losses caused by a surprise increase in the price paid to farmers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空中客车公司提高 A350 速率，凸显对波音公司的优势
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）将进一步提高其先进的A350宽体喷气式飞机的产量，因为该飞机制造商将受益于长途旅行需求的激增和主要竞争对手波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Airbus SE will further increase production of its advanced A350 widebody jet as the planemaker benefits from surging demand for long-distance travel and the crisis engulfing arch-rival Boeing Co.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行将关键利率降至 60
item.description: 阿根廷央行自哈维尔-米莱总统 12 月上任以来第四次下调关键利率，因为官员们押注南美国家的通胀将持续放缓。【原文：Argentina’s central bank cut its key interest rate for the fourth time since President Javier Milei took office in December as officials bet on a sustained slowdown in inflation in the South American nation.】

item.title: 散户自 11 月以来首次对股市持悲观态度
item.description: 个人投资者对美国股市在 4 月份跌跌不休后能否反弹持悲观态度，因为通胀仍然比预期的要严重，经济增长也停滞不前。【原文：Individual investors are pessimistic that the US stock market can bounce back after stumbling in April with inflation remaining stickier than expected and economic growth stalling.】

item.title: 与国际货币基金组织达成 40 亿美元贷款协议，厄瓜多尔债券大涨
item.description: 周四，厄瓜多尔与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成协议，将获得一笔为期四年、总额约 40 亿美元的贷款，在新兴市场国家中，厄瓜多尔债券涨幅居首。【原文：Ecuador bonds led gains among emerging-market peers Thursday after the nation reached a deal with the International Monetary Fund for a four-year loan of about $4 billion.】
